thread.section_title: Hotel Saint-Marc - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Paris Gem
thread.title_full: Paris Gem - Review of Hotel Saint-Marc, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Travelbug48362
title: Paris Gem
text: Charming hotel, well located. in a nice area close to the Opera/Bourse Staff were available at all times and extremely helpful. My daughter and I were visiting from New York City and felt very welcome. The rooms are exquisitely designed and the beds comfortable. We appreciated the teatime refreshments laid out after a busy day sightseeing. Booked the spa for an hour for a little relaxing time. Highly recommend and hope to visit again. Thank you so much to all the lovely staff
